m_szDocTitle: Apple Inc.(NASDAQ:AAPL) vs. Tesla Motors Inc(NASDAQ:TSLA) In The Electric Car Market | ETF DAILY NEWS
m_szDocSumamry: Diane Alter:  The Tesla Motors Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) stock price slipped 2.1% to $258.88 today (Tuesday) on news Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has begun working on its own electric car. The Wall Street Journal reported Apple is developing the car under the name “Project Titan.” Apple has already hired several seasoned automotive industry veterans to join the team and is looking to build the division’s workforce to 1,800 employees.
